text: Bob Slowik (born May 16, 1954) is an American football coach. He is currently the defensive coordinator of the Montreal Alouettes in the Canadian Football League (CFL). He was also a defensive coordinator for the Denver Broncos, Green Bay Packers, Cleveland Browns and Chicago Bears in the National Football League (NFL).
